title: Cao Xuanxuan's Love Journey
overview: The story unfolds as Zhou Na, a modern-day mystery novelist, finds herself serendipitously transported to ancient Yan City, where she becomes the fianc√©e of County Magistrate Guo Zijie. Together, they repeatedly solve bizarre cases. As their mutual affection deepens and their bond grows stronger, a sinister conspiracy involving life and death silently emerges...
